body: Hello Everyone, is there a proper way to assemble an EPConstruction for a rear ventilated facade? I didn´t find an air material, while composing, except for the window air material and the airwall material, which don´t seem to be the right choice.[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/suzYnbXNPs5CroNc-qu7r6BT79rip89QNICfc-h4hvVMfqRrvfZ6KOfftNf8QoV7alevAys8n6jagy3wcv9xNp8KzM-K15yE/ssss.PNG) Best regards, Dominik
topic: HoneyBee_EPConstruction air material for rear ventilated facade
